item.title: Liam Payne,Rita Ora - For You("Fifty Shades Freed"OST)
item.description:
In your eyes
I’m alive
Inside
you’re beautiful
Something
so unusual
In your eyes
I know I’m home yeah
Every tear
every fear
Gone with
the thought of you
Changing
what I thought I knew
I’ll be yours
for a thousand lives
I’m free
as a bird
When I’m flying
in your cage
I’m diving
in deep
And I’m riding
with no brakes
And I’m bleeding
in love
You’re swimming
in my veins
You got me
now
Been waiting for
a lifetime for you
Been breaking for
a lifetime for you
Wasn’t
lookin’ for love
‘Til I found you
oh na na ayy
For love
’til I found you oh
Skin to skin
breathe me in
Feeling
your kiss on me
Lips are made
of ecstasy
I’ll be yours
for a thousand nights
I’m free
as a bird
When I’m flying
in your cage(so lost)
I’m diving in deep
and I’m riding
With no brakes
(no luck)
And I’m bleeding
in love
You’re swimming
in my veins
You got me
now
Been waiting for
a lifetime for you
Been breaking for
a lifetime for you
Wasn’t
lookin’ for love
‘Til I found you
oh na na ayy
For love
’til I found you oh

‘Til I found you

’til I found you oh
